Statement: There should be an application that provides functionality for mobile users to propose and schedule meetings.
The wasp platforms must provide servicess that may be used by wasp applicationslications in order to personalize content for a specific end-user based on his or her user profile.
The wasp platforms should provide servicess that may be used by wasp applicationslications in order to personalize content for a group of end-users based on their user profiles.
The wasp platforms must provide servicess that may be used by a wasp applicationslication to charge the user for using one of his servicess.
The wasp platforms must allow end-users to provide profile and context information explicitly to applications or the platform.
A users profile must contain at least one charging point for a specific user.
A wasp applicationslication must be authorized by the end-user before charging his account.
The wasp platforms shall provide functionality to find points of interest that match the users explicit need and obey the restrictions following from the users profile and current context.
The wasp platforms must allow end-users to place triggers to be alerted automatically for a certain type of point of interests, based on his/her context.
The wasp platforms must allow end-users to place triggers in the platform to be alerted automatically for a certain type of servicess and events, based on his/her context.
The wasp platforms shall provide functionality to search for other people registered in the platform.
The wasp platforms shall provide functionality to find servicess that match the users explicit need and obey the restrictions following from the users profile and current context.
For the found servicess the wasp platforms shall provide (links to) the services profiles.
The wasp platforms shall allow end-users to maintain a buddy list.
The wasp platforms shall provide functionality for end-users to communicate with their buddies.
The wasp platforms should be able to use several communication servicess offered by the 3G platform.

The wasp platforms shall be able to update status and location information of buddies in the users buddy list based either on request of the user, after login into the wasp platforms and at a regular interval.
Information: buddies in buddy list, after login

Statement: The wasp platforms must allow end-users to set alerts in the platform on changes in the status and/or location of his buddies.
Interaction: alerts changes in status and location

Statement: When changes are discovered in the status and/or location of a users buddy, the wasp platforms must sent out notifications according to the alerts set by the user.
Information: change discovery on status or location

Statement: A wasp applicationslication shall be able to setup a phone call connection using the 3G Platform via the wasp platforms.
The wasp platforms shall allow status information to be stored, updated, retrieved and deleted in the users profile in the wasp platforms if the user allows this.

The wasp platforms shall allow end-users to give and remove Create, Read, Update, Delete (CRUD) access rights on parts of the user profile to other users, specific wasp applicationslications and the 3G Platform.
The wasp platforms shall allow other users, wasp applicationslications and/or the 3G Platform to ask the end- user for access rights on parts of the user profile.
The wasp platforms must be able to collect profile and context information on the user from multiple sources.
The wasp platforms should allow end-users to delegate and remove the rights to give access to parts of the user profile to other users.
The wasp platforms shall provide functionality to retrieve the current location of the user.
The wasp platforms must be able to retrieve status information from the 3G Platform.
The wasp platforms must be able to retrieve location information from the 3G Platform.
It must be possible for a wasp applicationslication to send out messages to users using the wasp platforms.

A wasp applicationslication should be able to automatically adapt content and the presentation of functionality to the users device, for which the wasp platforms may offer some generic adaptation servicess.
The wasp platforms must be able to combine knowledge about the end-user (in terms of profile and context) and a specific information request into a search query on the services registries.
The wasp platforms must be able to draw a map of a given area.
The wasp platforms must be able to show the location of users on a map.
The wasp platforms must be able to show the location of various points of interests on a map.
The wasp platforms shall be able to obtain the geographic location of points of interests.
The wasp platforms must be able to display a route connecting two or more points on a map.
The wasp platforms should be able to provide the end-user with walking or driving instructions.
The wasp platforms must be able to render all maps on small, mobile devices, as well as large, fixed terminals.
The platform must be able to access points of interests and servicess from a map.
The wasp platforms should be able to calculate a route between two or more arbitrarily chosen points, avoiding traffic jams or construction works.
Information: arbitrarily chosen point, avoid traffic and constuction works

Statement: The wasp platforms should have access to information about traffic jams and construction works, as well as suggested alternative routes.
The wasp platforms should be possible to determine the location of touristic attractions close to a calculated route.
The wasp platforms should be able to determine whether a traffic jam lies on a suggested route.
The wasp platforms must allow end-users to set an alert on an event.
The wasp platforms should allow the end-user to specify the notification type when setting an alert.
The wasp platforms must maintain a list of events the end-user can be notified about.
The wasp platforms must allow the end-user to remove previously set alerts on events.
The wasp platforms must notify the end-user about the occurrence of an event for which an alert was set, as soon as the event occurs.
The wasp platforms should be able to decide how to notify the user of an alert for which an event was set.
The wasp platforms must actively monitor all events.

If the user cannot be notified of the event the first time, the wasp platforms should retry to notify the user of the occurrence of the event, until the user has been notified or a specified time-out elapses.
There must not be any application data on the end-users device.
Only terminal capabilities may be terminal dependent and those capabilities may be stored on the end-users device.
The wasp platforms must maintain authentication credentials per user.
The wasp platforms should be able to request the users ID from the 3G platform.
The wasp platforms should have a (limited) number of classification schemes for POIs and servicess.
The wasp platforms must have a (web-based) form to specify simple POI and services profiles.
The wasp platforms should offer a tool that helps the 3rd party services provider to specify more complex profiles.
The platform must be able to store POI and services profiles.
The wasp platforms must allow for users to have different roles.
Profiles must have associated expiry dates.
The registries must check for their existence and should enforce them.
The registries may supply a default expiry date if none was specified.
servicess must have associated schedule information (this services is available weekdays from 8:00 till 16:00), a services may be available 24/7.
The registries must check for their existence, it may supply a default schedule if none was specified.

The wasp platforms shall follow international standards as much as possible for web services description, invocation, and registries as well as for the profiles of users, points of interests and servicess, and internal standards should be developed such that they are flexible and easily extensible.
The wasp platforms shall handle all requests in a best-effort manner.
